name: FoodyVille: Food Puzzle Mania
description:
FoodyVille needs your help. Some startup shops in this food town are at risk of closing. You will be visiting FoodyVille as a popular restaurateur. Your mission is to solve puzzles and fulfill quests to make these shops successful. You start by helping the coffee shop and the pizza shop stay in business. Unlock the juice shop, the burger shop, and other in game items as you progress through the game. Satisfy hungry foodies that are visiting the town and serve them the foods they crave. Beware of the Mayor's brother (aka the CEO of Evo Food Corp). Shops at FoodyVille are competitions to his food evolution factory business, which produces overly processed foods, and he will try to stop you from making these new shops successful. Will you help save these shops? Come meet foodies and join the fun today!

[ GAMEPLAY ]

Casual and Fun: FoodyVille is a unique food block match puzzle game. Simply drag and drop to match food blocks to play. Be sure to make smart match selections as the match choices are limited by the available food blocks on the left side of the screen. The game is easy to learn and to play but it does becomes quite challenging as you progress through. Solve puzzles and fulfill quests to complete levels, earn coins to upgrade the shops, and unlock in game items and special effects.

FoodyVille: Food Puzzle Mania Features:
- Fast pacing style gameplay - usually only takes a few minutes or less than a minute to play a level
- 100 levels of fun drag-and-drop food block matching puzzles
- Upgradeable shops
- Various unlockable in game items and special effects
- Achievements with Game Center integration
- Free to play*
- WiFi connection is not required to play**

*This game is free to play but also contains in-app-purchase and advertisements. In-app-purchase is optional. Also, please note that advertisement viewing uses internet connection. Data charges may apply based on your service plan. Please contact your service provider for more details.
